reason: This extensive letter, starting with 'Monti, 17.12.55' and 'Liebe Tante!', is almost entirely focused on the performance of a nativity play ('Krippenspiel'). The pages describe the performance, costumes, actors, rehearsals, and audience reactions in great detail. The final two pages discuss a coffee maker gift and conclude with Christmas greetings and the signature 'Drk'. The consistent theme and names (Sybille, Heinz, Joe, Manfred) strongly link these pages.
